title: Clubman Championship Celebrates 25th Anniversary Season
author: Championship Office
excerpt: The Clubman Championship marks its 25th anniversary in 2025 with a special commemorative season featuring classic car demonstrations and historic displays.
body: The Clubman Championship is celebrating its 25th anniversary in 2025 with a special commemorative season that honors the series' rich history while looking forward to an exciting future. The anniversary celebrations will feature historic car demonstrations and special displays at each round.

Since its inception in 2000, the Clubman Championship has provided a platform for grassroots motorsport enthusiasts to compete in purpose-built racing cars. The series has launched the careers of numerous professional drivers and remains a cornerstone of Australian club-level racing.

"Twenty-five years of Clubman racing represents thousands of competitors, countless memories, and a true celebration of grassroots motorsport," said Championship Coordinator Helen Davies. "We're proud of our heritage and excited about our future."

Special anniversary events will include a parade of historic Clubman cars from each decade of the championship's existence. Former champions and notable competitors have been invited to participate in demonstration runs throughout the season.

The anniversary season will culminate with a special gala dinner celebrating the championship's history, with awards recognizing significant contributors to the series' success over the past quarter-century.

seo.metaDescription: The Clubman Championship marks its 25th anniversary in 2025 with a special commemorative season featuring classic car demonstrations and historic displays.
